title: President Donald J. Trump Is Ensuring Patients Receive the Information They Need to Save Money on Prescription Drugs – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			
Issued on:
October 10, 2018
We will work every day to ensure all Americans have access to the quality, affordable medication they need and they deserve.
						President Donald J. Trump					HELPING PATIENTS SAVE MONEY: President Donald J. Trump is signing legislation to help give patients more information to save on their prescription drugs. LOWERING DRUG PRICES: The President is working to deliver savings for American patients.  PROTECTING SENIORS’ HEALTHCARE: President Trump will fight against so-called “Medicare for All” proposals that would take away benefits seniors have paid into all their lives.
